project_overview.name: Customer Onboarding and Success Portal (COSP)
project_overview.description: A web-based portal that enables customers to securely onboard, access product documentation, and track their usage metrics.

feature_breakdown.description: Allow customers to log in using their main SaaS product credentials (Single Sign-On).
acceptance_criteria: Users can log in successfully using their SaaS product credentials
Secure session management with no unauthorized access

feature_breakdown.description: Display a personalized onboarding checklist based on the customer's subscription level (Tier 1, Tier 2, etc.).
acceptance_criteria: Customers see an onboarding checklist tailored to their subscription level
Checklist items are accurately mapped to the customer's subscription tier

feature_breakdown.description: Integrate with the existing knowledge base API to allow seamless content searching and viewing.
acceptance_criteria: Users can search and view knowledge base articles within the COSP
Search results are accurate and up-to-date

feature_breakdown.description: Display a dashboard showing the customer's adoption metrics (e.g., daily active users, feature usage count).
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays relevant adoption metrics for the customer
Dashboard is responsive and performs well under load

feature_breakdown.description: Provide a 'Contact CSM' button that pre-populates an email or a Zendesk ticket with customer details.
acceptance_criteria: Users can easily contact their CSM from the COSP
Customer details are correctly pre-populated in the contact form

system_components: Microservices (Customer Data, Onboarding, Metrics, Knowledge Base)
technical_architecture.data_flow: User requests are routed through the API Gateway to the appropriate microservices. Microservices communicate with the database, cache, and third-party systems as needed to fulfill the requests. Metrics and usage data are collected and stored for reporting.
security_considerations: Enforce encryption (TLS 1.2+) for all network communications
Implement rate limiting and DDoS protection
Regularly audit and update security controls to comply with ISO 27001

implementation_phases.description: Deliver the core functionality of the COSP, including secure login, personalized onboarding checklists, and knowledge base integration.
deliverables: API integrations with identity management, onboarding, and knowledge base systems

implementation_phases.description: Implement the adoption metrics dashboard and the 'Contact CSM' feature to improve customer success and support.
deliverables: CSM integration with Zendesk and Salesforce

implementation_phases.description: Gather user feedback, monitor performance, and implement enhancements to improve the overall customer experience.
deliverables: New features based on customer feedback

risk_analysis.description: Delays in third-party API integrations (e.g., Knowledge Base, CRM, Helpdesk)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Engage with third-party vendors early, establish clear communication channels, and develop contingency plans

risk_analysis.description: Underestimation of development effort for complex features (e.g., Personalized Onboarding, Adoption Metrics Dashboard)
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Conduct thorough technical feasibility assessments, involve subject matter experts, and build in buffer time for unforeseen challenges

risk_analysis.description: Difficulties in ensuring high performance and scalability under heavy user load
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Implement a robust architecture with caching, load balancing, and auto-scaling capabilities; conduct thorough load testing

risk_analysis.description: Inability to meet the 6-month timeline for the Phase 1 (MVP) release
risk_analysis.mitigation_strategy: Establish a detailed project plan with clear milestones, allocate sufficient resources, and closely monitor progress

infrastructure_needs: Production infrastructure (cloud-based, highly available, and scalable)

success_metrics.target_value: Decrease by 5 percentage points within 12 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monthly analysis of customer retention data

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce from 30 days to 14 days within 6 months
success_metrics.measurement_method: Tracking the time between customer onboarding and first feature adoption

success_metrics.target_value: Reduce time spent on manual onboarding tasks by 25%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Periodic time-tracking and analysis of CSM activities

success_metrics.target_value: Increase the percentage of support questions resolved via the portal to 40%
success_metrics.measurement_method: Monitoring the ratio of self-service to ticket-based support

success_metrics.target_value: All pages must load within 2 seconds for 95% of requests
